question: I'm 26 wks pregnant with my 2nd child and I was just diagnosed with gestational diabetes after failing my 3 hour test. Now I have to do they sugar testing 4xs a day and see a high risk. All this is new to me had anyone else gone through this or can give me advice. I know that usually women with gestational diabetes have larger babies but at my 20 wk scan the doctor said my baby was weighing small but not yo worry cause she'll recheck her at 28 weeks, I can't help but to worry about that though.
title: 26 wks just diagnosed with gestational diabetes
